question.title: Count the Number of Experiments
mysqlSchemas: Create table If Not Exists Experiments (experiment_id int, platform ENUM('Android', 'IOS', 'Web'), experiment_name ENUM('Reading', 'Sports', 'Programming'))
insert into Experiments (experiment_id, platform, experiment_name) values ('4', 'IOS', 'Programming')
